card.name: Prisoner’s Dilemma
card.text: You and target opponent look at and then exile the top card of your libraries, face down. Declare its type, then reveal the exiled cards. If both players told the truth, both players scry 1 and then draw a card. If one player lied, that player draws a card. The other player discards a card. If both players lied, they both discard a card. Then each player puts the exiled card on the bottom of his or her library Exile this card.
